author: Maria Sacchetti, Jon Swaine
title: Wash. nursing home faces $611,000 fine over lapses during fatal coronavirus outbreak - The Washington Post
description: Wash. nursing home faces $611,000 fine over lapses during fatal coronavirus outbreak The Washington Post Feds fine Washington nursing home $611,000 over coronavirus response deficiencies | TheHill The Hill The coronavirus ravaged a Kirkland nursing home – lea…
content: In a letter Wednesday to Life Care Center of Kirkland, the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services wrote that the nursing home failed to report an outbreak of respiratory illness to local authorities for two weeks as required by law, gave inadequate care t… [+7604 chars]
